channel.title: Pat Martin
channel.description: Recent news about Pat Martin, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Standard Freeholder
item.description:
Ethics boss clears NDP MP using website to raise funds for legal bills
OTTAWA - The federal ethics commissioner has rejected a complaint against New Democrat MP Pat Martin's online fundraising efforts to cover legal bills. "The commissioner determined that an inquiry under the Conflict of Interest Code for members of the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Canadian Cattlemen
item.description:
NDP's CWB critic shuffled to public works
NDP leader Tom Mulcair on Friday announced a mini-shuffle of critic responsibilities in his shadow cabinet, in which he reassigned Pat Martin, MP for the riding of Winnipeg Centre, as critic for public works and government services. Martin had been the NDP's ...
